At the Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis, we have been working on fraud and forgery detection since 1998. Our work spans every Canadian province and our court-qualified examiners all have decades of experience.

To find out more about our forensic handwriting analysis services, see below.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1675151967759{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Specialists” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]The Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis is proud to work with a number of court-qualified experts.

Our specialists include:

  • Handwriting Examiners

  • Handwriting Specialists

  • Handwriting Analysts

  • Handwriting Experts

  • Forensic Document Examiners

  • Document Examination Experts

They work across fields, focusing their attention on everything from handwriting forgeries to forensic signature examinations to forgery detection.

All of our experts are Canadian and have been working in their respective fields for many years, building up experience and crucial knowledge.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]We provide a wide variety of services to our clients.

These include:

  • Forged handwriting, documents, and signature examination

  • Altered handwriting, documents, and signature examination

  • Suspect handwriting, documents, and signature examination

  • Questioned handwriting, documents, and signature examination

  • Forgery analysis, detection, comparison, verification, and authentication

  • Signature validation, comparison, and authentication

  • Handwriting comparison, verification, and validation

  • Handwriting analysis, examination, assessment, and authentication

  • Document validation, examination, and authentication

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Along with these services, our experts can also give court testimony in areas including

  • Poison pen letters, handwriting, and documents

  • Threatening death handwriting, letters, and documents

  • Threatening handwriting, letters, and documents

  • Anonymous handwriting, documents, signatures, and letters

  • Falsified handwriting, documents, and signatures

  • Authentication of handwriting, signature, documents, and questioned documents

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Businesses We Have Worked With” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Our experts have spent their time with us working across a range of industries with many different business types. Businesses we have worked with include the following.

  • Loan companies – Working on bank documents, mortgages, cheques, IOU documents, signature cards, and contracts
  • Real estate businesses – Looking at deeds, leases, contracts, and mortgages
  • Estate – Including wills, holographic wills, codicils, and contracts
  • Private businesses, corporations, and industries – Looking into threatening handwritten notes written by former employees
  • Law firms – To examine legal documents, signatures, and legal contracts
  • Courts – Examining affidavits and court signatures
  • Hospitals – Working on patient signature cards, hospital documents, hospital charts, patient admission signatures, and prescription signatures
  • Corporate handwriting analysis
  • Insurance companies – Including insurance records and policies
  • Banks – Looking at cheques, signatures, loans documents, and mortgage documents Workplaces that have experienced graffiti or threatening employee letters.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Experience” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]The Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis is court-qualified in Ontario, Quebec, Alberta, and Newfoundland, Canada. This means that if you require forensic handwriting analysis for your court case in one of these provinces, we can help you out.

As well as working with courts in these provinces, we have also worked with private clients in all other Canadian provinces, in places including Manitoba, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Montreal, Prince Edward Island, Vancouver, and Winnipeg.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Notable Cases We Have Worked On” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Forensic handwriting analysis covers many different industries and areas. In the following celebrated cases, handwriting played a vital role.

  • Karla Homolka’s jailhouse letters – Accomplice to her husband, The Schoolgirl Killer, Homolka is a Canadian serial killer. We examined Homolka’s jailhouse letters for the Toronto Sun to determine their authenticity.
  • The Rubin “Hurricane” Carter Case – Rubin Carter was a middleweight boxer wrongfully accused of murder after police profiling. He served 20 years for a murder he did not commit. Handwriting played a vital role in his wrongful conviction and resulted in the movie– ”The Hurricane”–starring Denzel Washington.
  • The Martha Stewart Case – The technique used for aging the ink used against Martha is not respected nor used by reputable forensic experts.
  • The JonBenet Ramsey Murder Case – In this case, a five-page ransom note was found after the murder of a seven-year-old girl.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Fees” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Our fees are as follows

  • $200.00/hr for examination
  • $900.00 for ½ day court appearance
  • $1800.00 for a full-day court appearance

Note: if money is an issue, we may offer reduced rates in some special cases.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”0″ bottom_margin=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Looking for Forensic Handwriting Analysis in Toronto And Canada? Call the Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis Today for More Information” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Are you looking for a forensic handwriting analysis service in Toronto or Canada? The Canadian Centre for Handwriting Analysis is proud to offer a huge range of services to meet your needs.

Get in touch with us today to find out if we could help you out.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
